General.Name: Yunnan Tin Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Tin Company Limited engages in the tin production and processing activities in China. The company offers tin ingots, special tins for float glass production, bearing alloy ingots, lead-based alloys, tin-lead wire solders, zinc and tin zinc alloy wires, lead-free solder wires and bars, casting solder bars, extruder solder bars, tin granules, tin balls, spherical solder powders, ball grid array solder balls, tin and solder anodes, lead-free solder pastes, low-temperature solder pastes, and eutectic solder pastes. It also provides copper cathode products, tin chemicals, indium and silver ingots, organic and inorganic tin chemicals, etc. The company also exports its products. Yunnan Tin Company Limited was 1883 and is based in Kunming, China.
General.Address: No. 121, East Jinhu Road, Gejiu, China, 661000
